tool_description: This API provides iOS version details web scrapped from WikiPedia website
title: apple-ios-version-details

api_list.name: Get details about a particular iOS version
api_list.description: This endpoint provides details about a particular iOS version
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apple-ios-version-details.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/version/{iosversion}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apple-ios-version-details.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all iOS version details
api_list.description: This endpoint gives all the iOS versions details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apple-ios-version-details.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apple-ios-version-details.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
